acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited by Clifton Waller Barrett on December 17, 1963, accessioned on January 29, 1965, and changed to a gift on July 1, 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 9 items, chiefly manuscripts and correspondence of Grace King.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of two series. Series I includes manuscripts, and Series II includes correspondence.

did.unittitle: Grace King to Mr. W. Smith 1887 Dec 11;

scopecontent.p: Acknowledges receipt of book from Mr. Smith and replies that she has no printed book to return the favor.

did.unittitle: Grace King to Mr. Thomas Mason 1888 May 7;

scopecontent.p: Sends signed note and thanks Mr. Mason for his compliments; w/print of King from Harper's Monthly.

did.unittitle: Grace King to Mrs. Nixon 1898, Christmas;

scopecontent.p: Thanks Mrs. Nixon for the book and says she has not been well and will not be celebrating Christmas; sends greetings to Mrs. Nixon and her family.

did.unittitle: Grace King to Mrs. Nixon Monday;

scopecontent.p: Invites Mrs. Nixon for tomorrow and hopes that Mrs. Warner will play because she is a delightful musician.

did.unittitle: Grace King to Julia Ward Howe Monday;

scopecontent.p: Invites Mrs. Howe to hear Mrs. Warner play tomorrow afternoon.

did.unittitle: Grace King to Mrs. Nixon Saturday;

scopecontent.p: Reminds Mrs. Nixon that she promised to have lunch with her today; tells her that Mrs. Hopkinson Smith will be there.
